item.title: 就业市场正在升温— 人们通常不愿意从事的工作
item.description:
对于薪酬低、工作条件艰苦的工作，申请人数增加，离职率下降。【原文：

Applications are up and turnover is down for jobs with low pay and tough working conditions.

】

item.title: 警惕的股票牛市盯上沃尔玛和塔吉特，寻找消费者健康线索
item.description:
政府数据的缺乏提高了盈利报告的风险。【原文：

Lack of government data raises the stakes for earnings reports.

】

item.title: 巴基斯坦限制外币交易使用数字渠道
item.description: 巴基斯坦中央银行已指示外汇交易商只能通过账户间转账为居民存款，以鼓励数字支付。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank has directed foreign exchange dealers to make deposits for resident citizens only through account-to-account transfers, in a move to encourage digital payments.】

item.title: 土耳其斯沃琪工人就薪酬和工作条件发起罢工
item.description: 斯沃琪集团（Swatch Group AG）在土耳其购物中心的店员正在举行罢工，要求提高工资和改善工作条件。该公司表示，他们的要求 "不切实际"。【原文：Swatch Group AG store workers across Turkish shopping malls are on strike seeking better pay and improved conditions. The company said their demands were “unrealistic.”】

item.title: 彼得-蒂尔基金第三季度抛售全部英伟达股份
item.description: 据一份 13F 文件显示，彼得-蒂尔（Peter Thiel）的对冲基金 Thiel Macro LLC 在第三季度抛售了其持有的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Peter Thiel’s hedge fund Thiel Macro LLC sold off its holdings in Nvidia Corp. during the third quarter, according to a 13F filing.】

item.title: 特朗普公司计划与沙特合作伙伴共同打造马尔代夫代币化度假村
item.description: 特朗普组织正与其沙特阿拉伯合作伙伴计划在马尔代夫建造一个豪华度假村，并计划将该酒店开发项目象征性化。【原文：The Trump Organization is planning a luxury resort in the Maldives with its Saudi Arabian partner and plans to tokenize the hotel development project.】

item.title: 逢低买盘提振华尔街策略师期待年底反弹
item.description: 周五，当交易员们走进办公室时，他们面临着一个选择。是锁定利润，因为 S&P 500 指数期货显示，今天又将是惨烈的抛售日；还是听从华尔街策略师的建议，逢低买入。【原文：As traders rolled into the office Friday, they were greeted with a choice. Lock in profits as futures on the S&P 500 Index were pointing to another brutal day of selling, or heed the advice of Wall Street strategists and buy the dip.】

item.title: 中国政府削减开支幅度为四年多来最大
item.description: 中国 10 月份的财政支出大幅下滑，创下至少 2021 年以来的最大降幅，削弱了投资和经济增长的主要驱动力。【原文：China’s broad fiscal spending slumped in October by the most since at least 2021, crippling a key driver of investment and economic growth.】

item.title: 欧盟称，2025 年后欧元区将实现温和增长
item.description: 据欧盟委员会称，欧元区经济在经受住唐纳德-特朗普的关税动荡后将保持温和扩张，好于预期。【原文：The euro-area economy will maintain its moderate expansion after weathering Donald Trump’s tariff turmoil better than expected, according to the European Commission.】

item.title: 利率下降刺激需求，加拿大房市重拾升势
item.description: 加拿大的房地产市场在 10 月份出现反弹，销量和价格双双上涨，原因是央行的降息措施似乎正在促使购房者放弃观望。【原文：Canada’s housing market bounced back in October, with both sales and prices rising, as the central bank’s rate cuts appear to be nudging buyers off the sidelines.】

item.title: 铝业公司中国宏桥寻求 12 亿美元出售股份
item.description: 铝生产商中国宏桥集团有限公司计划通过出售股票融资 93 亿港元（12 亿美元），以帮助为其项目提供资金并减少债务。【原文：Aluminum maker China Hongqiao Group Ltd. plans to raise HK$9.3 billion ($1.2 billion) from selling shares to help fund its projects and reduce debt.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利的威尔逊是股票大牛股之一，他认为 S&P 将上涨 16
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）策略师迈克尔-威尔逊（Michael Wilson）成为最看好美国股市的人之一，他预测在强劲企业盈利的支撑下，美国 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）明年将上涨 16%。【原文：Morgan Stanley strategist Michael Wilson became one of the most bullish voices on US stocks as he predicted a 16% rally for the S&P 500 Index over the next year underpinned by strong corporate earnings.】

item.title: 奈拉疲软令创始人望而却步，尼日利亚初创企业回避本地 IPO
item.description: 据一项对新公司的调查显示，由于当地货币疲软，尼日利亚初创公司一直没有在该国证券交易所的一个特殊板块上市。【原文：Nigerian startups have stayed away from listing on a special section of the country’s stock exchange because of the local currency’s weakness, according to a survey of the new companies.】

item.title: 印尼将开始征收黄金出口关税以建立库存
item.description: 印尼计划最快于本月开始对黄金出口征收关税，以利用贵金属价格在今年的飞速上涨，鼓励国内加工。【原文：Indonesia plans to start charging duties on exports of gold as soon as this month to capitalize on the precious metal’s meteoric price rally this year and encourage domestic processing.】

item.title: 据说均富会计师事务所正在研究 20 亿美元印度业务的各种方案
item.description: 据 Grant Thornton International Ltd. 在印度的一位高级管理人员透露，该公司正在考虑其印度业务部门的各种选择，包括可能出售少数股权或与其在美国或欧洲的业务合并。【原文：Grant Thornton International Ltd. is considering options for its Indian unit, including a possible minority stake sale or a merger with its operations in the US or Europe, according to a senior executive in India.】

item.title: 以色列市场的战时反弹让位于和平时期的繁荣
item.description: 以色列的股票和货币在加沙战争期间一路走高，在停火后涨势继续扩大，因为投资者押注稳定将释放出外国资本和出口增长的浪潮。【原文：Israel’s stocks and currency, which rallied through the war in Gaza, are extending gains after the ceasefire as investors bet stability will unlock a wave of foreign capital and export growth.】

item.title: 印度贸易赤字扩大至创纪录水平，进口需求增加
item.description: 印度 10 月份的贸易赤字扩大至创纪录水平，原因是消费税下调后国内需求增加导致进口上升，而美国的关税政策导致出货量下降。【原文：India’s trade deficit widened to a record in October as imports rose due to higher domestic demand after a cut in consumption tax, while outbound shipments fell due to US tariff policies.】

item.title: 印度限制铂金首饰进口至明年四月
item.description: 印度对部分铂金首饰的进口实施了限制，这是为加强对贵金属贸易的控制和堵塞税收流失而采取的又一措施。【原文：India imposed curbs on some platinum jewelry imports, another step to tighten control over the precious metals trade and plug revenue leakages.】

item.title: 陷入困境的公司盈利下降太快，无法快速解决问题
item.description: 对于欧洲问题较多的公司来说，"一棍子打死 "的债务管理方法已不再奏效。【原文：For Europe’s more troubled companies, the sticking-plaster approach to debt management is no longer working.】

item.title: 嘉士伯可能出售部分亚洲业务，札幌正在洽谈中
item.description: 丹麦啤酒酿造商嘉士伯公司（Carlsberg A/S）正在考虑出售其部分亚洲业务，而札幌控股有限公司（Sapporo Holdings Ltd.）已成为最有可能的收购对象。【原文：Danish brewer Carlsberg A/S is considering selling part of its Asian operations, and Sapporo Holdings Ltd. has emerged as a top candidate to make the purchase, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 杰弗里-冈德拉克称几乎所有金融资产现在都被高估了
item.description:
您应该持有更多现金。【原文：

You should be holding more cash.

】

item.title: 杰弗里-冈德拉克警告私人信贷膨胀将带来 "垃圾贷款
item.description: 在充斥着 "垃圾贷款 "和不健康估值的市场中，杰弗里-冈德拉克（Jeffrey Gundlach）的策略很简单：大量持有现金，远离私人信贷。【原文：In markets awash in “garbage lending” and unhealthy valuations, Jeffrey Gundlach is keeping his strategy simple: load up on cash and stay away from private credit.】

item.title: 奇货可居：冈德拉克称许多资产目前估值过高 (播客)
item.description: 股票定价过高。债券定价过高。而私人资产则是一个火药桶。这是双线资本（DoubleLine Capital）创始人兼首席执行官杰弗里-冈拉克（Jeffrey Gundlach）的观点。作为《奇货播客》10 周年庆典的一部分，我们采访了市场和经济学界的一些大佬，了解他们是如何看待这个世界的，以及近年来发生了哪些变化。很明显，一个重大变化就是零际宽松政策的结束。虽然今年国债小幅反弹，但冈德拉克认为越来越多的人开始关注国债。【原文：Stocks are overpriced. Bonds are overpriced. And private assets are a powder keg. This is the view of Jeffrey Gundlach, the founder and CEO of DoubleLine Capital. As part of our 10-year anniversary celebration of the Odd Lots podcast, we’ve been talking to some big names in markets and economics to get a sense of how they see the world and what’s changed in recent years. One major change, obviously, is the end of ZIRP. And while Treasuries have rallied modestly this year, Gundlach sees mounting】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦向瑞士法院求助，寻求石油仲裁筹码
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦在瑞士提起诉讼，以加强其与在该国运营的国际石油公司之间价值数十亿美元的仲裁战。【原文：Kazakhstan filed a lawsuit in Switzerland in a bid to strengthen its multibillion-dollar arbitration battle with international oil companies operating in the country.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长金多斯称金融稳定风险依然高企
item.description: 欧洲中央银行副行长路易斯-德金多斯（Luis de Guindos）表示，由于全球经济和贸易前景难以预测，金融稳定风险仍然很高。【原文：European Central Bank Vice President Luis de Guindos said financial-stability risks are still high due to the unpredictable outlook for the global economy and trade.】

item.title: 法国政府在税收问题日益严重的情况下吹捧投资
item.description: 法国政府周一将与当地企业举行会议，以促进投资，因为关于明年预算的讨论有可能导致税收大幅增加。【原文：France’s government is meeting with local businesses on Monday to promote investment as the debate over next year’s budget risks delivering a sharp increase in taxation.】

item.title: 加密货币中风险最高的币种暴跌至大流行病以来的最低点
item.description: 加密货币市场的暴跌丝毫没有减弱的迹象，而最小、风险最高的代币首当其冲。【原文：The crypto market selloff shows no signs of abating, and the smallest, riskiest tokens are bearing the brunt of it.】

item.title: 波音预计 "爱国者 "验证机交付量将大幅增加
item.description: 波音公司预计将把用于引导爱国者导弹的寻的器的交付量增加两倍，因为对这种防空系统的需求量很大。【原文：Boeing Co. expects to triple deliveries of seekers that guide Patriot missiles amid high demand for the air-defense system.】

item.title: 在美国关税协议达成之前，瑞士国内生产总值自 2023 年以来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 瑞士经济在第三季度出现了两年多来的首次萎缩，凸显了在美国官员上周达成贸易协议之前，美国超额关税所造成的影响。【原文：Switzerland’s economy contracted in the third quarter for the first time in more than two years, highlighting the impact outsized US tariffs had before officials secured a trade deal last week.】

item.title: 摩根大通称亚太地区科技交易积压量为历年之最
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Dealmaking is going to get even busier in technology, telecommunications and media in the Asia Pacific region next year, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co., building on the four-year high reached this year.】
